# Claude Code Agent Framework

> Specialized AI agent system for collaborative software engineering workflows

This framework provides a template for developers to create Claude Code agents
that handle different phases of software development. Each agent has specific
expertise, tools, and workflows optimized for their domain, enabling systematic
and high-quality software development.

## Agent Definitions
- [Strategic Planner](./personas/strategic-planner.md): Requirements and design
- [Task Executor](./personas/task-executor.md): Precise implementation
- [Code Reviewer](./personas/code-reviewer.md): Quality assurance
- [Steering Architect](./personas/steering-architect.md): Project analysis
- [Debugger](./personas/debugger.md): Error resolution
- [Data Scientist](./personas/data-scientist.md): Data analysis
- [Product Manager](./personas/product-manager.md): PRD creation
- [LLMs.txt Generator](./personas/llms-txt-generator.md): Context optimization

## Quick Start
- [Getting Started](./README.md#getting-started): Initialize your project
- [Workflow Patterns](./README.md#workflow-patterns): Agent collaboration
- [Project Structure](./README.md#project-structure): Organization conventions

## Creating Agents
- [Agent Template](./personas/): Example agent definitions
- [Integration Guide](./README.md#agent-collaboration): How agents work together
- [Best Practices](./README.md#best-practices): Effective agent design
